name: Colony Defender 2
description:
Game is still in Development / Demo

Colony Defender 2 is a retro shoot em up game inspired by classics from the SNES era to my Atari inspired Colony Defender. The game is still in development but you can play this demo to get an impression of the current progress.

Controls:

Movement = Keyboard Arrow Keys / Left Stick

Attacke = Keyboard Space/ XBox R2

Megabombe = Keyboard A / XBox A

Megashield = Keyboard S /  XBox X

Megalaser = Keyboard D / XBox B

Selfdestruct = Keyboard Del

Pause = Keyboard Esc / XBox Start
